title: Scherer happy to see education bill approved
text: Scherer happy to see education bill approved Jul 12, 2024 2 mins ago 0 Facebook WhatsApp SMS Print Copy article link Save Scherer As featured on Scherer happy to see education bill approved Sue Scherer is a Democrat who resides in Decatur and represents the 96th House District.
